Text saved: Understanding that there can be differences in expectations and behaviour can help us avoid misunderstandings. However, it is very important to remember that cultural stereotypes, which are simple and often unfair ideas about a group of people, can be bad for building good business relationships. Although our national culture can influence how we behave and think, we are also mostly influenced by the region we come from, the communities we are part of, our age and gender, our company's culture, and our own personal experiences. For this reason, we should keep these possible differences in mind, but we should not use them to judge all individuals from an entire country in the same way.
